logger.doc:name: Initial Logger
logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json indent = false --- { timestamp: (now() >> "IST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:SS"}, transactionId: attributes.headers.'x-abc-msgid', appName: app.name, flowName: flow.name, businessProcessName: "HealthCheck", originatingApplication: "External system", destinationApplication: "NA", customerIdentifier: "NA", txnstate: "Start Log"
}]

logger.doc:name: start Logger
logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json indent = false --- { timestamp: vars.requestVar.startTime, transactionId: vars.requestVar.headers.'x-abc-msgid', appName: app.name, flowName: flow.name, businessProcessName: "HealthCheck", originatingApplication: "External system", destinationApplication: "NA", customerIdentifier: "NA",
}]

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message:
#[%dw 2.0 output application/json indent = false --- { timestamp: (now() >> "IST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:SS"}, transactionId: vars.requestVar.headers.'x-abc-msgid', appName: app.name, flowName: flow.name, businessProcessName: "HealthCheck", originatingApplication: "External system", destinationApplication: "NA", customerIdentifier: "NA", txnState: "End Log", executionTime: ((now() >> "IST") as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:SS"}) - vars.requestVar.startTime
}]
